AI Description: RapidJSON is a fast JSON parser and generator for C++ with both SAX/DOM styles. It is designed to be highly memory efficient and is self-contained with no external dependencies.
Core Features: Fast Parsing & Generation Of Json Data, Support For Both Sax & Dom Parsing Styles, Memory Efficient Design, No External Dependencies, Conforms To Json Standards, Utf-8 Encoding Support
General Tags: Json, C++, Parser, Generator, Sax, Dom, Memory Efficient
